remarks: Weaker version of ~ abvpropd .  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Nov-2017.)
statement:
abvpropd2.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( Base ` K ) = ( Base ` L ) ) $.
abvpropd2.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( +g ` K ) = ( +g ` L ) ) $.
abvpropd2.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( .r ` K ) = ( .r ` L ) ) $.
abvpropd2 $p |- ( ph -> ( AbsVal ` K ) = ( AbsVal ` L ) ) $.
